front.title: Traffic Engineering Extensions to OSPF for Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) Control of Evolving G.709 OTN Networks

abstract.t: This document describes Open Shortest Path First - Traffic Engineering (OSPF-TE) routing protocol extensions to support Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) control of Optical Transport Networks (OTN) specified in ITU-T Recommendation G.709 as published in 2012. It extends mechanisms defined in RFC4203.
